resources.string: Read and write to a Mifare Classic card
On tapping the tag will read with default keys. If the key is unknown the block can\'t get read
Warning: a write operation may damage your tag - be careful

After pressing the read complete button the app tries to read all sectors of the tag using default authentication keys.\n\nThe app seems to be frozen, so kindly wait a few seconds (depending on device and tag) - be patient !
